TopicTitle: Interesting Sterioscopic video I discovered on youtube.

Articles.Content:
Check it out. I can't view it in full screen and keep it in 3d, but its neat.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/HM-x1OnwMw4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
You can make videos like this in KSP by using two Lazor mod cameras at the same time.
